room_title: Escape room "Mafia Warehouse" by That Escape Place in Houston
review: Lots of fun for everyone! Patient and friendly staff! Our kiddos, 8 and 10, loved it and were able to contribute to the game! Will definitely be back for other rooms! Thanks for the fun!

room_title: Escape room "Mafia Warehouse" by That Escape Place in Houston
review: That escape place was so fun! We were looking for an escape room we could include the kids with & we found it that escape place is Very kid friendly! We went with a 7 year old & 10 year old and they had a blast! What an experience! The staff was super friendly and helpful. Thank you for a wonderful experience.

room_title: Escape room "Mafia Warehouse" by That Escape Place in Houston
review: This was our first escape room and we didn't know what to expect.  The staff was really nice.  The room we did was really fun and challenging, but in a good way that kept us entertained and wanting to come back.  The only criticism I have is that I wish there was an option for a special rate where we could do two adventures back to back for a reduced price. We will definitely be back!
